name: .CIMG File Extension
summary: Learn about .CIMG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file used by CImg, an open-source C++ template library used for processing image data; may contain data about a single image or multiple images; supports up to four-dimensional data (one dimension scalar signals to three-dimensional hyperspectral volumetric images).

content: CIMG files are used for storing images in a format that can be manipulated with the toolkit; they may store data extracted from common image file types, such as .PNG and .JPG files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
